message.deleteSure: Are you sure you want to delete the selected contents?
message.deleteSuccess: The selected contents has been deleted.
message.deleteFail: Failed to delete the selected contents. Please try again after a while.
message.deleteNotExist: The selected content does not exist in the Workspace. Please check again.
message.deleteShared: It is impossible to delete when the content sharing status is activation.
message.updateSuccess: The selected content sharing settings have been updated.
message.updateFail: Failed to update content sharing settings please try again later.
message.updateNotExist: The selected content does not exist in the Workspace. Please check again.
